info.title: Liferay Commerce Admin Catalog API
info.description: Liferay Commerce Admin Catalog API. A Java client JAR is available for use with the group ID 'com.liferay', artifact ID 'com.liferay.headless.commerce.admin.catalog.client', and version '4.0.72'.

get.description: Retrive low stock actions for products.

additionalProperties.example: {en_US=Hand Saw, hr_HR=Attachment Title HR, hu_HU=Attachment Title HU}

title.example: {en_US=Hand Saw, hr_HR=Attachment Title HR, hu_HU=Attachment Title HU}

dataType.description: The field type (e.g., image, text, etc.).

name.description: The field's internal name. This is valid for comparisons and unique in the structured content.

data.description: The field's content value for simple types.

data_i18n.description: The localized field's content values for simple types.

latitude.description: The latitude of a point in space.

longitude.description: The longitude of a point in space.

Geo.description: A point determined by latitude and longitude.

productEntryToPublisherAssets.description: Information about the object relationship productEntryToPublisherAssets can be embedded with "nestedFields".

duration.description: Number of days to download the attachment

maxUsages.description: Number of downloads available for attachment

sampleSrc.description: URL to download the sample file

termsOfUseJournalArticleId.description: Terms of Use related Article Id

auditEvents.description: Optional field with the audit events associated with this object entry, can be embedded with nestedFields

friendlyUrlPath.description: A relative URL to the page's rendered content.

additionalProperties.description: The localized relative URLs to the page's rendered content.

friendlyUrlPath_i18n.description: The localized relative URLs to the page's rendered content.

keywords.description: A list of keywords describing the object entry.

items.description: A list of keywords describing the object entry.

taxonomyCategoryBriefs.description: The categories associated with this object entry.

accountEntryToPublisherAssets.description: Information about the relationship accountEntryToPublisherAssets can be embedded with "nestedFields".

productEntryToPublisherAssets.description: Information about the relationship productEntryToPublisherAssets can be embedded with "nestedFields".

actionIds.description: The collaborator actions for the shared asset.

items.description: The collaborator actions for the shared asset.

additionalProperties.description: Block of actions allowed by the user making the request.

actions.description: Block of actions allowed by the user making the request.

dateExpired.description: The expiration date to be a collaborator of the asset.

share.description: If the collaborator can share or not the asset.

Collaborator.description: Represents a collaborator for an entry.

additionalName.description: The author's additional name (e.g., middle name).

externalReferenceCode.description: The external reference code of the author.

image.description: A relative URL to the author's profile image.

profileURL.description: A relative URL to the author's user profile. Optional field, can be embedded with nestedFields.

id.description: The ID of the user group.

name.description: The name of the user group.

AuditEvent.description: Optional field with the audit events associated with this object entry, can be embedded with nestedFields

externalReferenceCode.description: The parent taxonomy category's external reference code.
The parent category's `TaxonomyVocabulary` external reference code.

embeddedTaxonomyCategory.description: Optional field with the embedded taxonomy category, can be embedded with nestedFields

taxonomyCategoryId.description: The category's ID. This can be used to retrieve more information in the `TaxonomyCategory` API.

TaxonomyCategoryBrief.description: The categories associated with this object entry.

fileBase64.description: optional field with the content of the document in Base64, can be embedded with nestedFields (the format of the nested field must be `<attachment field name>.fileBase64`)

fileURL.description: optional field that specifies the source of the file to be downloaded, can be embedded with nestedFields (the format of the nested field must be `<attachment field name>.fileURL`)

previewURL.description: optional field that specifies the preview URL of the file to be used, can be embedded with nestedFields (the format of the nested field must be `<attachment field name>.previewURL`)

thumbnailURL.description: optional field that specifies the thumbnail of the file to be used, can be embedded with nestedFields (the format of the nested field must be `<attachment field name>.thumbnailURL`)
